attributes.description:
2017 Suzuki Jimny 1.3 4x4 manual for sale. A great all round , tried & tested, Mid Sized 4x4 utility vehicle. If you're in the market for a well looked after Jimny, look no further this vehicle is the one for you.
Standard Features: 4x4 | ABS Brakes | Air Conditioning | Airbags | Alarm | Alloy Wheels | Auxiliary Audio Input | Bluetooth | Central Locking | EBD Electronic Brake Distribution | Fog Lights | Front Electric Windows
Car comes with Full Service History and Spare keys. 
Extras include: Nudge Bar | Roof Rack | Towbar

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Top Speed - 140 km/h
Airbags (total) - 2
Length - 3,645 mm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 40 litres
Boot Capacity - 113 litres
